snippet: The AMC drama averaged just 2.3 million viewers at 10 p.m., down from 3.4 million from the premiere a year ago.
abstract: Ratings for AMC television drama Mad Men fall 34 percent for seventh season premiere; show averages just 2.3 million viewers at 10 pm, down from 3.4 million from the premiere a year ago.
lead_paragraph: The AMC drama averaged just 2.3 million viewers at 10 p.m., down from 3.4 million from the premiere a year ago.

headline.main: Steep Drop in Ratings as ‘Mad Men’ Begins Its Final Season
headline.print_headline: ‘Mad Men’ Ratings Decline by 34% in Season Premiere
